thread.title: BRIEF-Lingnan Landscape's Units Plan Ecological JV, Two Funds With Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lingnan Landscape's Units Plan Ecological JV, Two Funds With Partners
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Lingnan Landscape Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO SET UP ECOLOGICAL JV WORTH 700.1 MILLION YUAN ($107.52 million) WITH PARTNERS INCLUDING GF SECURITIESâ€™ ASSET MANAGEMENT AFFILIATE
* SAYS IT AND SHANGHAI UNIT PLAN TO INVEST UP TO 220 MILLION YUAN TO SET UP TWO FUNDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mgwPK6 ; bit.ly/2DdOA4S Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5114 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
